name: meeting-facilitator
description: Real-time meeting facilitation app for gathering and revealing team responses

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "npm run dev:server" "wait-on http://localhost:3001/api/health && npm run dev:client"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:server && npm run typecheck:client
scripts.check:all: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run knip
scripts.fix:all: npm run lint:fix && npm run format && npm run knip:fix
